channel.title: News on EnzymeML Project
channel.description: Recent content in News on EnzymeML Project

item.title: EnzymeML 1.0 released 2020-11-02
item.description: The specifications for EnzymeML 1.0 are now available from the Downloads page. Additionally, EnzymeML team submitted for our first paper for publication. The reference for the preprint is: Range J, Halupczok C, Lohmann J, Swainston N, Kettner C, Bergmann FT, Weidemann A, Wittig U, Schnell S, Pleiss J (2020). EnzymeML â€“ a data exchange format for biocatalysis and enzymology. https://www.EnzymeML.org You can download our preprint and supporting information.
